casebody.data:
In the Matter of MOSEWELL SECURITY CORPORATION, Alleged Bankrupt-Respondent, Louis Ghosser, Appellant. No. 406. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 4, 1931. Leo J. Linder, of New York City (Albert P. Singman, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Sternberg & Rosen, of New York City (Sydney Ehrlich, of New York City, and Mortimer D. Atlas, of Brooklyn, N: Y., of counsel), for respondent.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
